body:
Dammit this got my blood boiling really bad. "Family?" "Because we're family!" FAMILY? Fucking self-entitlement leeches that trample on a simple person's happiness because they are older and 'believe' they are entitled to their selfish wants? Bastards the lot of them!

Dammit this brought up a lot of pent up rage...
STOP KILLING THE MOOD AND ENDED IT WITH BAD ENDING(SAD ENDING)

Ha. 'if ___ then they weren't really brother'. Please. What world do you live in? Family is the most heinous of horrible people you will ever know, because you are 'family' they feel they can do whatever they want. Are all members of a family evil shit bags? No. But being 'family' being 'blood-relatives' means precisely JACK SHIT. Their blood isn't going to boil, explode, or in any other way stop them from doing terrible shit to you and everyone you love. You don't owe blood anything. When someone turns on you, you turn them out. End of story. This guy should have just axed the first black shade bastard right when he started raping the mermaid, and then knew what to do for the next two.
Why must you wound me so?

I remember a story more or less like this described in a manga. Only there wasn't rape, nor a mermaid, and the guy gaved away his body, piece by piece to devils. Or was some forest animals? I don't remember anymore. I remember the guy died with a smile on his face, but those who got the body parts were making fun of him. It was a story to teach about don't givin away somethign important for you without reason. And I'd have cut the leg of those brother. With a rusty, blunt knife. After all if they were willing to cripple him for their own gain and to rape his girl then they weren't really brother.
How could a good guy like him has brothers like that is beyond me, nice story tho.
i came here to fap, not to fell. Dammit!
